title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Identification (short-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Low density of flowers AND low proportion of deep flowers/high proportion of shallow flowers

· Range or point within the area of the graph less than or equal to 4 (flower density) AND less than or equal to 0.4 (proportion)

Identification (long-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Minimum value greater than or equal to 0.60
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

Identification (short-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Low density of flowers AND low proportion of deep flowers/high proportion of shallow flowers

· Range or point within the area of the graph less than or equal to 4 (flower density) AND less than or equal to 0.4 (proportion)

Identification (long-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Minimum value greater than or equal to 0.60

Student response earns one of the available points.

Identification (short-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Low density of flowers AND low proportion of deep flowers/high proportion of shallow flowers

· Range or point within the area of the graph less than or equal to 4 (flower density) AND less than or equal to 0.4 (proportion)

Identification (long-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Minimum value greater than or equal to 0.60

Student response earns two of the available points.

Identification (short-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Low density of flowers AND low proportion of deep flowers/high proportion of shallow flowers

· Range or point within the area of the graph less than or equal to 4 (flower density) AND less than or equal to 0.4 (proportion)

Identification (long-tongued advantage) (1 point)

· Minimum value greater than or equal to 0.60

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Prediction (1 point)

· The proportion of plants with deep flowers will decrease.

Justification (1 point)

· The bees will not transfer pollen from the deep flowers.

· Seed production from deep flowers decreases.

· Plants with deep flowers will not be fertilized/pollinated/able to reproduce.

· Bees can obtain nectar without touching the pollen.

· Short flowers will be selected for/deep flowers will be selected against.
